p: Precipitation data were obtained from the Climate Prediction Center's (CPC) rainfall data for the world (1979 to present, 50 km resolution) via raincpc R package [ 25] and aggregated for each Brazilian municipality over the study period. We also retrieved data on mean monthly surface temperature from Reanalysis CFSR model [ 26] (reference: CREATE-IP.reanalysis.NOAA-NCEP.CFSR.atmos.mon, data node: esgf.nccs.nasa.gov).
